channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: ByteDance是世界上最大的科技公司之一，因创建了TikTok而闻名于世。但是，美国众议院即将对一项法案进行投票，如果TikTok不与ByteDance脱离关系，就可能在美国被禁止使用。
item.description:
ByteDance is one of the world's biggest tech firms -- best known as the creator of TikTok.
But the House of Representatives is set to vote on a bill that could see TikTok banned in the United States if it does not sever itself from ByteDance.https://t.co/5mZPiUAIQK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频尼日利亚神圣的斋月已经开始，一代人以来最严重的经济危机让这个非洲人口最多的穆斯林国家的许多人都在为养家糊口而挣扎。
item.description:
VIDEO: The holy fasting month of Ramadan has begun in Nigeria, with the worst economic crisis in a generation leaving many in Africa's most populous Muslim country struggling to provide for their families. pic.twitter.com/MFpJ0RO0zh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 🇪🇺 约 3.7 亿欧洲人将在 6 月 6 日至 9 日期间选出 @Europarl_EN 的 720 名成员。🗳️ 在欧盟 27 个国家中，哪些问题事关重大，哪些辩论会引发公众舆论。➡️ by @AFP for #EDNHub
item.description:
🇪🇺 Some 370 million Europeans will elect the 720 members of the @Europarl_EN between June 6-9.
🗳️ What are the issues at stake and the debates stirring public opinion in the 27 nations of the EU.
➡️ https://t.co/yC48yaoe99 by @AFP for #EDNHub pic.twitter.com/Q0L6cWcjmV

— EU Data News Hub🇪🇺 (@EUDataNewsHub) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频：雷宾-皮什蒂万（Rebin Pishtiwan）蜷缩在一辆面包车的后座上，仔细地扫描着一页又一页泛黄的纸张，这是库尔德斯坦艺术与文化中心（KCAC）发起的一个项目的一部分，该项目旨在将有可能永远消失的库尔德历史文献数字化。
item.description:
VIDEO: Huddled in the back of a van, Rebin Pishtiwan carefully scans one yellowed page after another, as part of a project launched by the Kurdistan Centre for Art and Culture (KCAC) to digitise historic Kurdish texts at risk of disappearing forever. pic.twitter.com/7Nc3qM5ogX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频：一艘为巴勒斯坦人运送粮食援助的西班牙慈善船驶离塞浦路斯拉纳卡港，前往饱受战争蹂躏的加沙，那里的大范围饥荒正成为日益严重的威胁。
item.description:
VIDEO: A Spanish charity ship carrying food aid for Palestinians leaves Larnaca port in Cyprus and heads for war-ravaged Gaza, where widespread famine is a growing threat. pic.twitter.com/UQXhdU0Ma0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频：瑞典气候活动人士格丽塔-图恩伯格（Greta Thunberg）在与其他活动人士一起堵住瑞典议会入口时说："全球气候大罢工已经过去五年了，我们觉得自己有点像破了的唱片。
item.description:
VIDEO: "It's five years since the global climate strike, and we feel a bit like broken records," says Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg as she blocks an entrance to the Swedish Parliament along with other campaigners. pic.twitter.com/xP5KLHfj1k

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 德国汽车巨头大众汽车公司周三报告称，受汽车交付量增加的推动，2023 年的利润将出现超预期的增长，但对今年的前景持谨慎态度。
item.description:
German auto giant Volkswagen on Wednesday reported a forecast-beating rise in profits for 2023, boosted by higher vehicle deliveries, but gave a cautious outlook for this year.https://t.co/TQxf9b6c8V

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频：四艘美军舰艇载着约 100 名士兵和设备离开弗吉尼亚基地，他们将在加沙海岸建造一个临时港口，用于运送急需的援助物资。
item.description:
VIDEO: Four US Army vessels depart a base in Virginia carrying about 100 soldiers and equipment they will need to build a temporary port on Gaza's coast for urgently needed aid deliveries. pic.twitter.com/lpJfbKYIjM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 中国政府周三警告说，对中国拥有的视频分享应用 TikTok 的禁令提议将 "不可避免地反过来咬美国一口"。
item.description:
Beijing warned on Wednesday that a proposed ban on Chinese-owned video-sharing app TikTok would "inevitably come back to bite the United States".https://t.co/UmTA8wZ6gP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频：游客将被禁止进入京都著名艺妓区的私人小巷。
item.description:
VIDEO: Visitors will be banned from entering private alleys in Kyoto's famous geisha district, as the ancient city tackles overtourism after the pandemic. pic.twitter.com/Qpiltmkk6V

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: Katespiracy"（凯特斯盗版）这幅照片本意是为了平息人们对英国威尔士王妃凯瑟琳的行踪和健康状况的猜测，但她被篡改的形象却在互联网上引发了一股谣言和阴谋论的洪流。
item.description:
'Katespiracy'

The picture was meant to douse speculation about the whereabouts and health of Britain's Catherine, Princess of Wales, but instead her manipulated image unleashed a torrent of internet-breaking rumors and conspiracy theorieshttps://t.co/UVkn4IkapL pic.twitter.com/YZpTvK8R5w

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 雾霾和生病的孩子：在曼谷，数百名泰国儿童在学校开放的中庭旁吃力地唱国歌，他们嘶哑的嗓音和脆弱的肺部与八车道呼啸而过的车流展开了激烈的竞争。
item.description:
Smog and sick kids: Thai pupils endure air pollution.

Hundreds of Thai children strain to sing the national anthem, reedy voices and fragile lungs competing against eight lanes of belching traffic next to their school's open atrium in Bangkokhttps://t.co/esAZ82Wp5E pic.twitter.com/GB8GPTRnf7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 中国北部特大爆炸造成 2 人死亡，26 人受伤
item.description:
Huge blast kills two, injures 26 in northern Chinahttps://t.co/KThpKnR9ip pic.twitter.com/Om0JXOFXd7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 神圣的工作伊拉克库尔德人将书籍数字化，拯救濒临灭绝的文化
item.description:
'Sacred job': Iraq Kurds digitise books to save threatened culturehttps://t.co/h2c77CFXbk pic.twitter.com/DsqXcijg9W

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频： 北约新成员瑞典参加演习，俄罗斯威胁迫在眉睫北约正在芬兰和挪威北部的北极地区举行自冷战以来最大规模的演习，瑞典军队作为北约成员首次参加了演习。这...
item.description:
VIDEO: New NATO member Sweden joins drills as Russian threat looms

Tanks power across the Arctic landscape of northern Finland and Norway as NATO conducts its biggest drills since the Cold War, with Swedish troops taking part for the first time as members of the alliance. The… pic.twitter.com/T5XSRFylDX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: #纳瓦尔尼的盟友列昂尼德-沃尔科夫（Leonid Volkov）在袭击事件后表示 "我们不会放弃"。
item.description:
#BREAKING Navalny ally Leonid Volkov says 'We will not give up' after attack pic.twitter.com/bBc2b1H5Fb

item.title: 佛罗里达州正在制定相关规定，以杜绝近年来失控甚至暴力的派对活动，去年 3 月就有两人在枪击案中丧生。
item.description:
Miami Beach cracks down on Spring Break party excess.

Florida is enacting rules to stamp out partying which has gotten out of control -- and even violent -- in recent years, with two killed in shootings last Marchhttps://t.co/U26R4wsFBp pic.twitter.com/qqE3M1W015

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: #日本公司制造的一枚火箭在周三发射后发生爆炸，日本公共广播公司（NHK）播放了火箭爆炸的画面。
item.description:
#BREAKING A rocket made by a Japanese company exploded just after launch on Wednesday, with public broadcaster NHK showing footage of the fiery failure pic.twitter.com/dQSfWY1b79

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 随着海水上升，哥伦比亚的加勒比海明珠正在慢慢下沉。全世界的低洼地区都处于应对气候危机的前沿阵地，卡塔赫纳的脆弱程度可想而知。
item.description:
Colombia's Caribbean jewel slowly sinking as sea waters rise.

With low-lying communities worldwide on the front lines of the climate crisis fight, Cartagena is conspicuously vulnerablehttps://t.co/kOx5JiuREn pic.twitter.com/X48BsRatPQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 女王芭比娃娃。芭比娃娃可能没有在奥斯卡颁奖典礼上获奖，但她获得了卡米拉女王的皇室认可，卡米拉女王是不朽的标志性娃娃之一。
item.description:
Queen Barbie.

Barbie may not have won at the Oscars, but she has the royal seal of approval from Queen Camilla, who was immortalised as one of the iconic dollshttps://t.co/xUnhAVLhgP pic.twitter.com/unDFsyjc7u

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在哥伦比亚考卡山谷省布埃纳文图拉港附近查获一艘载有约2.5吨大麻的船只后，@AFP的华金-萨米恩托（Joaquin Sarmiento）拍摄到哥伦比亚海军人员正在整理毒品包装。
item.description:
Tons of drugs.@AFP's Joaquin Sarmiento photographs Colombian navy personnel arranging packages of drugs after a boat was seized with approximately 2.5 tons of marijuana near the Port of Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca department, Colombia.

A semi-submersible known as a… pic.twitter.com/eXV7czVZyW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: #联合国表示，2022 年幼儿死亡人数将创历史新低，达到 490 万
item.description:
#BREAKING Early childhood deaths reach record low in 2022 at 4.9 million, says UN pic.twitter.com/0ZQR9QEsqE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 马德里竞技队主教练迭戈-西蒙尼和后卫阿克塞尔-维特塞尔周二表示，他们希望安托万-格里兹曼的复出能将他们带入欧洲冠军联赛四分之一决赛。
item.description:
Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone and defender Axel Witsel said Tuesday they hoped Antoine Griezmann's return could propel them into the Champions League quarter-finals.https://t.co/b9PuAlRo7k pic.twitter.com/093FkYWtKs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 当地警方告诉法新社，已故俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的亲密盟友列昂尼德-沃尔科夫在立陶宛的家门口遭到袭击。
item.description:
Leonid Volkov, a close ally of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, was assaulted outside his home in Lithuania, local police told AFP.https://t.co/Pau1v47RNu pic.twitter.com/Lghkc9zwJp

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在包括佐治亚州在内的初选投票中，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在各自的总统提名竞选中均取得了不可撼动的领先优势。
item.description:
Joe Biden and Donald Trump eyed unassailable leads in their separate presidential nomination races in primary voting that included Georgia -- a US swing state where Trump faces trial over an alleged conspiracy to steal the last election.https://t.co/GsRp2jaaQs pic.twitter.com/kxqhTYjNmr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 里约劫持人质者投降，释放俘虏：警方
item.description:
#BREAKING Rio hostage-taker surrenders, frees captives: police pic.twitter.com/tLrdvg99G9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: PGA 巡回赛负责人杰伊-莫纳汉（Jay Monahan）表示，与 LIV Golf 公司沙特阿拉伯支持者的谈判正在 "加速进行"，但他对两家机构之间拟议的合资企业将如何运作守口如瓶。
item.description:
PGA Tour chief Jay Monahan said talks with the Saudi Arabian backers of LIV Golf were "accelerating" but was tight-lipped on how the proposed joint venture between the two bodies would work.https://t.co/sM2CoNWWZv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024
